Sometimes we gave entertainments, and we took great care that all that we prepared for the table was palatable and 
                                                                           473
nicely served. In fruit season, we would get blueberries and raspberries fresh from the bushes, and strawberries fresh from the vines. We made the table fare an object lesson which showed those present that our diet, even though it was in accordance with the principles of health reform, was far from being a meager one.
